sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da je nekaj
okay
, mislimo, da je tisto sprejemljivo.

seg.quote: I'll have another coffee and then I'll be going, if that's okay.
She wanted to know if the trip was OK with the government.
I asked Jenny how she thought it all went. ‘Okay,’ she said.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da je nekdo
okay
, mislimo, da je zdrav in se dobro počuti.

seg.quote: ‘Where's Jane?’—‘Just back there. She's okay. Just shocked.’

sense.def:
Okay
lahko rečemo, kadar se z nečim strinjamo ali se hočemo prepričati, ali nas sogovornik razume in se strinja z nami.

seg.quote: ‘I'll be back at a quarter past one.’—‘OK. I'll see you then.’
I'll be back in fifteen minutes. OK?

sense.def:
Z besedo
okay
lahko sogovorniku pokažemo, da želimo govoriti o nečem drugem ali delati nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: Okay, do you mind if we speak a bit of German now?
